divs: sighting detailsi'm reposting my report because i usually see my pictures\proof on alot of diffrent web-sites pretaining to ufo's...and i've sent in some great pictyres on my last 2 reports and haven't seen much on the web...so thats my resoning...i first saw this same exact ufo on april 12th,2011...well tonight august 23rd,2011 it has shown up again??? it is very large it has 3 red rectangular lights...it is one of my best pictures i have captured to date..i think these web cams have infared capability, it's the only way to explain these images i capture... everyone thinks & tells me they are planes and helicopters...i really dont think so. i also caught a large cylinder shaped ufo..its very big..& bright...and some strange objects on the east river..look at my pictures, they are real !!! i wish someone would just look into this already...hey bill birnes call me...lol !!! thank you all...signed ~marko333~the alien king~
